timeline.name: Frontend/Backend
timeline.description: I strive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and best practices, balancing frontend and backend development to create robust and aesthetically pleasing applications. My goal is to exceed user expectations by providing innovative and intuitive solutions.

timeline.name: Motivation and Rigor
timeline.description: Rigorous and highly motivated, I am determined to deliver quality solutions and collaborate effectively within dynamic teams.

timeline.name: Exploration and Curiosity
timeline.description: I am also passionate about various sciences, astronomy, and manga. I love exploring new horizons, whether in the real world or in imaginary universes. I am always seeking new experiences and knowledge, and I believe curiosity is the key to success.

timeline.name: Seeking Exciting Projects
timeline.description: I am currently looking for professional opportunities as a Fullstack JavaScript developer. If you have job offers, freelance missions, or interesting projects to propose, do not hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss your needs and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

technologies.title: Technologies and Tools Used
technologies.description: Here are some of the tools and technologies that I use, or have already used, to develop modern and high-performance web applications.

informations.subtitle: I am a Fullstack JavaScript Developer
informations.title: This site is an interactive portfolio, designed to introduce myself and my projects. It offers smooth and intuitive navigation, with some animations and an elegant design. It is designed to be accessible on all devices, providing an optimal user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.primary: I am a Fullstack JavaScript developer with a professional degree in web and mobile web development (Bac +2). Specialized in React.js, I am passionate about continuous learning and solving technical challenges. I launched myself as a freelancer by creating my company, Albalino Web Studio, where I offer my web development services to help my clients realize their digital projects.
about.secondary: I strive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and best practices, balancing frontend and backend development to create robust and aesthetically pleasing applications. My goal is to exceed user expectations by providing innovative and intuitive solutions.
about.tertiary: Rigorous and highly motivated, I am determined to deliver quality solutions and collaborate effectively within dynamic teams.
about.quaternary: I am also passionate about various sciences, astronomy, and manga. I love exploring new horizons, whether in the real world or in imaginary universes. I am always seeking new experiences and knowledge, and I believe curiosity is the key to success.
about.quinary: I am currently looking for professional opportunities as a Fullstack JavaScript developer. If you have job offers, freelance missions, or interesting projects to propose, don't hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss your needs and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here is a selection of projects that I have successfully completed during my training at O'Clock school and since working as a freelancer. These achievements have allowed me to develop and refine my skills in web development, mainly implementing technologies such as JavaScript, React, Redux, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, WordPress, as well as tools like Git and GitHub.
projects.description2: This achievement is the result of my end-of-studies project at O'Clock school, a challenge I took up in total autonomy. Over a month, I was able to concretize all the skills developed during my training by creating a web application from A to Z, in collaboration with a team of four developers. This project, in perpetual evolution, is particularly close to my heart. As the lead frontend developer, I continue to enrich the application by regularly integrating new features and optimizations.
projects.description3: Only the Atlas of Forgotten Realms is currently deployed online.

formationProjects.title: Atlas of Forgotten Realms
formationProjects.description: The Atlas of Forgotten Realms is a web application for Dungeons and Dragons enthusiasts. Dive into a universe where you can not only create, customize, and manage your characters but also design and orchestrate your own campaigns.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Character creation in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image2Description: All races in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image3Description: Barbarian class in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.image4Description: Excerpt from the source code of a character component for statistics.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the source code of a character component for certain attributes.
formationProjects.image6Description: Image of a Tiefling in the Atlas of Forgotten Realms.
formationProjects.alt: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Barbarian class
formationProjects.alt2: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Character creation
formationProjects.alt3: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Discover the races
formationProjects.alt4: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Source code excerpt
formationProjects.alt5: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Source code excerpt
formationProjects.altPreview: Atlas of Forgotten Realms - Home page

formationProjects.title: Ghibliotheque
formationProjects.description: This site, now entirely front-end, uses React, Redux, Tailwind, and some libraries to provide complete access to the Studio Ghibli film catalog. Each film is accompanied by images, detailed summaries, and various information. Currently, the site is deployed online.
formationProjects.image3Description: General view of the films available in the Ghibliotheque.
formationProjects.image4Description: Detail of a film with all its information.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the source code of the component to display the films.
formationProjects.image6Description: Image from the film My Neighbor Totoro.

formationProjects.title: Pokédex
formationProjects.description: This interactive site, exclusively back-end without dependency on the official Pokémon API, allows users to create a personalized Pokédex by adding their own Pokémon. Currently, the site is not deployed online.
formationProjects.imageDescription: General view of the Pokémon list.
formationProjects.image2Description: Pokédex homepage showing recently added Pokémon.
formationProjects.image3Description: Detail of a Pokémon with all its information.
formationProjects.image4Description: List of favorite Pokémon in the Pokédex.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the database source code.

formationProjects.title: O'Recipes
formationProjects.description: This site is a platform for culinary recipes, fast and interactive, designed with React. This project integrates user authentication management and a favorites feature. Currently, the site is not deployed online.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Page of a chocolate mousse recipe.
formationProjects.image2Description: List of favorite recipes on O'Recipes.
formationProjects.image4Description: Excerpt from the source code of the user reducer.
formationProjects.image5Description: Excerpt from the source code of the login form.

formationProjects.title: Albalino Web Studio
formationProjects.description: This site is the website of my company, Albalino Web Studio, which I created using WordPress. It faithfully represents my services and expertise, offering an optimal user experience thanks to a neat design and intuitive navigation. The site is currently online and showcases my portfolio, services, and ways to contact me.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Home page of the Albalino Web Studio site.

formationProjects.title: CSK Unity
formationProjects.description: This site is the website of the company CSK Unity, my first client as a freelancer. The site brings together two companies and was created using WordPress. It faithfully represents the activities and services offered by CSK Unity, providing an optimal user experience thanks to a neat design and intuitive navigation. The site is currently online and presents the two companies, their services, and ways to contact them.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Home page of the CSK Unity site.

formationProjects.title: Le Restaurant
formationProjects.description: This site is a template website for a restaurant where the content is entirely editable by the owner through an admin dashboard. It allows modifying dishes, menus, images, etc. Offering a user-friendly interface, the owner can easily manage the site's content.
formationProjects.imageDescription: Home page of the admin dashboard.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Here's where you can get in touch with me. Send me a message to discuss your projects, my skills, or any other topic that interests you. I will be happy to respond. You can also contact me via LinkedIn or GitHub.
